author: James Tanner
method: Place the halibut slices in the centre of a plate and pour over the lemon and lime juice. Season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper, then leave to 'cure' for 15-20 minutes. To serve, garnish the plate with lime wedges and the fresh parsley leaf.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz halibut, thinly sliced,  ½ lime, juice only,  ½ lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  ½ lime, cut into wedges to garnish,  fresh flatleaf parsley leaf, to garnish
